devdoc.details: This contract works as a registry of versions, it holds the implementations for the registered versions.

addVersion(string,address).details: Registers a new version with its implementation address

params.implementation: representing the address of the new implementation to be registered
params.version: representing the version name of the new implementation to be registered
representing the first version to be set for the proxy

createProxy(string).return: address of the new proxy created

getVersion(string).details: Tells the address of the implementation for a given version
getVersion(string).return: address of the implementation registered for the given version

devdoc.title: Registry
